text: Valdoule is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. The municipality was created on 1 July 2017 and consists of the former communes of Bruis (the seat), Montmorin and Sainte-Marie.Arrêté préfectoral 24 March 2017 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes
title: Valdoule
